verses.name: 2 Kings 17:30
verses.text: And the men of Babylon made Succoth–benoth, and the men of Cuth made Nergal, and the men of Hamath made Ashima,

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:31
verses.text: And the Avites made Nibhaz and Tartak, and the Sepharvites burnt their children in fire to Adrammelech and Anammelech, the gods of Sepharvaim.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:32
verses.text: So they feared the Lord, and made unto themselves of the lowest of them priests of the high places, which sacrificed for them in the houses of the high places.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:33
verses.text: They feared the Lord, and served their own gods, after the manner of the nations whom they carried away from thence.
